title: Ep. 24 - Who Are The Kongos?
description:
On today's show, the guys recap their long Thanksgiving weekends and dive into some world news while Pat heads to the Big Apple. They discuss an ATM accidentally spitting out 100's instead of 10's and 20's, a Chinese scientist dipping his toe into human experiments, a parrot sexually harassing her owner, and a woman beating her significant other after he didn't want to have sex. Todd wants to know what holiday the guys would create and why, they play some fact or fiction, answer some listener questions including creating their own pub drinks for each other, and close out the show with a couple of vitamin thoughts. It's a good time, come and enjoy it with us.

This episode includes @toddmccomas, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and @baileymccomas, and closes with a song by The Kongos.
dc:creator: The Pod
